metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for Punt Labs projects

plugins.name: punt
plugins.description: Punt Labs standards enforcement — init, audit, and LLM-powered reconciliation of workflows, configs, and project structure

plugins.name: dungeon
plugins.description: A text adventure game engine for Claude Code — play scripted dungeon crawls powered by Claude as game master

plugins.name: biff
plugins.description: UNIX-style team communication for Claude Code: /who, /finger, /plan, /write, /read, /mesg, /tty, /last, /wall, /talk

plugins.name: prfaq
plugins.description: Amazon Working Backwards PR/FAQ process — generate professional LaTeX documents for product discovery and decision-making

plugins.name: tts
plugins.description: Voice for your AI coding assistant: /notify, /speak, /recap, /say — hear when tasks finish or need input

plugins.name: quarry
plugins.description: Local semantic search with automagic knowledge capture: /find, /ingest, /explain, /source, /quarry
